thread.title: Great situation on Wall Street, a bit funky and a super room
thread.title_full: Great situation on Wall Street, a bit funky and a super room - Review of Andaz Wall Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JolyonG
title: Great situation on Wall Street, a bit funky and a super room
text: In Town for a conference at the Andaz I elected to stay there. It's a slightly intriguing hotel with an open reception and very helpful staff. My corner suite was huge with a pretty funky design, the bathroom was great with a separate guest bathroom off the living space. Breakfast was perfectly good.
